name: Summon Evil Monster
text: You can summon the aid of creatures driven their very nature to destroy goodness.
benefit: When casting summon monster, you also have access to the list of evil monsters on this page. When summoning a creature from this list, your debased nature allows you to cast the spell as a standard action. The summoned creature appears as normal for the spell but can’t act until next your next turn. It is not flat-footed, however, and it can make attacks of opportunity as normal. These effects don’t apply for creatures from the standard list that aren’t also on this list.
special: If you possess the Sacred Summons feat, you can apply it to a creature on this list whose alignment (as opposed to its subtype or subtypes) matches your aura.
text_zh: 你可以召唤那些天性即为毁灭善良的生物来帮助你。
benefit_zh:
当你施放召唤怪物（Summon Monster）法术时，你可以使用本页的邪恶怪物列表。当你从该列表中召唤生物时，你的堕落天性允许你以一个标准动作施放该法术。被召唤的生物如常出现，但在你的下个回合到来前不能行动。但它并非措手不及，可以如往常一般发动借机攻击。这些效果不适用于在标准列表中但不在该列表中的生物。

特殊情况：若你拥有神圣召唤（Sacred Summons）专长，你可以将其应用于该列表中阵营与你的灵光相符（即使亚种或亚种之一相反）的生物。
